articles.title: Moderna COVID-19 vaccine gets emergency use authorization - INQUIRER.net
articles.description:
MANILA, Philippine — The COVID-19 vaccine of American pharmaceutical firm Moderna has been granted an emergency use authorization (EUA), the Food and Drug Administration said Wednesday.

articles.title: Biden’s new goal: get 70% of Americans vaccinated by Fourth of July - The Guardian

articles.content:
